content: transparently and is assigned the characteristics of the failing PU. If an upgrade request cannot be accomplished within the configuration, a hardware upgrade is required. Central processor complex hardware components 57 The following upgrade paths for the IBM z16 are shown in Figure 2-26: Figure 2-26 IBM z16 A01 system upgrade paths  IBM z16 A01 to IBM z16 A01 upgrades: – Max39 - Max82, Max125 are concurrent (if FC 2981 or 2982 initially ordered) – No upgrade to Max168 or Max200 (these features are factory-built only) – More I/O drawers can be added based on available space in current frames
